articles.description: Reaction to Brighton's draw at Crystal Palace, Premier League news conferences, plus build-up to Aston Villa v Sheffield United and Club World Cup final.
articles.title: Premier League reaction & news conferences

articles.description: BBC Sport's Simon Stone looks at the proposals for a new breakaway European competition and assesses what could happen next.
articles.title: European Super League - what happens next?

articles.description: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says "we have to look after" supporters as his club reject involvement in the European Super League.
articles.title: Arsenal must oppose Super League for fans - Arteta

articles.description: England head coach Matthew Mott remains confident about England's T20 World Cup defence in 2024 despite the series defeat by West Indies.
articles.title: England have 'exciting things' ahead in T20s - Mott

articles.description: Australia opener Usman Khawaja says the black armband he wore during the first Test against Pakistan was for a "personal bereavement" and not in support of civilians in Gaza.
articles.title: Khawaja says armband was for 'personal bereavement'

articles.description: The Detroit Pistons are one match away from equalling the NBA's longest single-season losing streak following a 119-111 defeat by the Utah Jazz.
articles.title: NBA: Detroit Pistons close in on 26-match losing-streak record

articles.description: Lucas Vázquez strikes deep in stoppage time as 10-man Real Madrid win at Alaves to go top of La Liga.
articles.title: Ten-man Real Madrid beat Alaves to go top

articles.description: In his third fight of 2023, Anthony Joshua faces Otto Wallin in Saudi Arabia in a fight he must win if he wants to take on Deontay Wilder in 2024.
articles.title: Win over Wallin will complete Joshua's rebuild mission

articles.description: The Los Angeles Dodgers sign Japanese right-handed pitcher Yoshinobu Yamamoto on a 12-year deal worth a reported $325m (£256.2m).
articles.title: LA Dodgers: Yoshinobu Yamamoto joins on 12-year deal for reported £256.2m

articles.description: Manchester United's drawn-out ownership saga could be resolved before Christmas Day.
articles.title: Man Utd ownership saga may be over before Christmas
